introduction:
【 HELLO 】
Hello, I'm Aki Ezaki.

【 PROFILE 】
I'm from Nagoya, Aichi Prefecture, and currently living in Cebu.

【 WHAT I LOVE 】
What I love is AI.
Recently, I've been deeply immersed in an AI tool called "Cursor".

【 What kind of person is Aki Ezaki? 】
Aki Ezaki is someone who continues to refine himself to the extreme
to deliver inspiration to the world.

【 PURPOSE OF CREATING THIS SITE 】
I wanted to try AI development.
Also, my goal is to deploy this site on AWS, connect Lambda and SNS, and create a system that sends Gmail notifications when the server goes down.
